Key Match Events: Mitchell blazes Shoriful over midwicket for his fourth sixth, sealing victory for New Zealand with more than eight overs to spare.
Daryl Mitchell plays a reverse sweep, Mitchell and Phillips have ensured there will be nothing further for New Zealand fans to worry about in this chase.
Another Williamson injury scare... Kane Williamson was hit on the thumb of his left hand.
Mitchell makes his move, And just like that, Mitchell’s gone up a gear.
Conway falls as grafting 45 puts NZ on top, Shakib Al Hasan produces the goods, sliding past an attempted reverse-sweep and extracting three reds on DRS despite Conway’s hopeful review.
King Kane in the runs again, There's a certain inevitability about Williamson's landmark on his return.
Williamson retires hurt, After facing one more ball at the end of the over, and another visit from the physio, he opted to retire hurt for 78 off 107 balls midway through the next.
